title: Two Mediums: Our Guides' Views of the Afterlife
features: What happens after we die? Is there an afterlife? Is it possible to communicate with loved ones who have passed?
If you’ve ever asked questions like these, you are not alone. Dr. Smith addresses these inquiries…and more.
Comprised of personal stories and anecdotes and approximately one hundred questions and answers about immortality and the afterlife,
Two Mediums, Team Spirit: Our Guides’ Views of the Afterlife,

explores the seminal questions that have puzzled humankind for centuries and delivers answers directly from the source—those who live in the afterlife. An intelligent and inspiring text, it combines author Prudence Ann Smith’s experiences as a medical doctor and medium with the insights of other established mediums to present a comprehensive picture of what lies beyond this life, as well as of the ways mediumship can bridge the gap between our world and the next.
is a must-read for anyone who has ever wanted to know more about the true nature of the spiritual realm, as well as for anyone looking to embrace the eternal without fear.
description: Prudence Ann Smith, MD, FACR, is a practicing board certified physician with fellowship training in radiology. In addition to her medical education and experience, she has extensively researched the afterlife and has communicated with the dead, firsthand, as a medium.

In her endeavors to understand and embrace the other side of our existence, Smith has asked many questions about human mortality, after death survival, and purpose and has celebrated the answers received from her guides and those of other mediums. Her incredible journey, and the insight she gained along the way, is intelligently and thoughtfully presented in her newest title,
Two Mediums, Team Spirit: Our Guides' Views of the Afterlife
store: Prudence Ann Smith M.D., FACR (Author),  Harvey Paul Karr (Contributor)
